_comment: Edit this file to customize job search behavior. No code changes needed.
_sort_by_comment: DD = most recent first. R = most relevant.
_max_days_old_comment: Time limit for job search. 0 = no limit (search all available). Set to e.g. 7 or 14 to restrict to recent jobs only. When a limit is set, results are strictly filtered — no fallback expansion.
_max_candidates_comment: Max job cards to collect per scrape attempt. 2x target (15) as buffer.

fallback._comment: Fallback is intentionally disabled. Search returns exactly what matches — no range expansion.

ai._experience_levels_comment: 1=Internship 2=Entry 3=Associate 4=Mid-Senior. AI Engineer roles often post at level 4 even for new grads.

_max_candidates_preview_comment: Max candidates for job search preview (cli.py scrape). Smaller = faster.
